titleStmt.title: General Monks welcome (from the Citie) to Whitehall To the tune of, When the King enjoys his own again.
titleStmt.author: Ticwhit, G.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "All ye heroes of the land,".
Imprint from Wing; actual publication date is given according to Lady Day dating.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
